general.mobile-search: Find apartments, studio, villas, chalet , rest houses, farms and camps

favorite.added-to-favorite: The property was added to the favorite
favorite.removed-from-favorite: The property was removed from the favorite
favorite.error-remove-unit: The property has not been deleted from the favorite
favorite.error-add-unit: The property has not been added to the favorite

general.no-results-title: We did not find results that match your research!
general.no-results-description:
Try to modify search options, such as the number of rooms, or expand the time or site.  
We are sure that you will find a place that suits you!

hero.title: Wherever you go we got you Mabet!
hero.description: Search, explore, choose and enjoy an overnight experience for researchers, apartments, villas, chalets, breaks, camps and more ..!

add-your-unit.title: Mabet Business
add-your-unit.desciption: The mechanism of adding a real estate!
add-your-unit.sub-description: Join Mabet, the licensed platform from the Ministry of Tourism, and start achieving income from your property through a smooth and safe experience, a comprehensive management system and professional benefits.

1.description: Start by adding your property within minutes through a clear and fast model.
1.title: Easy registration

2.title: A safe payment
2.description: An integrated and safe payment system to protect your transactions and follow your profits.

3.title: Control panel
3.description: Turn your reservations, monitor performance, and contact customers from one place.

4.title: Easy share
4.description: Share your real estate link directly with your customers and get reservations.

top-rated-units.title: Try real estate that others like!

download-app-banner.desciption:
Control your reservations, review real estate, and try an easy and fast experience through Mabet mobile Application. 
All you need in one place at any time and anywhere.
download-app-banner.title: Smart overnight experience in your hands!

blogs.title: Mabet Blog!
blogs.sub-description:
Discover everything you need to know about the best destinations, smart reservation tips, and the latest hospitality news. 
Our articles are carefully written to inspire you and help you make better decisions.

why-mabet.desciption: What makes booking with overnight stay special?
why-mabet.title: Mabet Features

1.title: Guaranteed booking
1.description: Book your unit in seconds and relax — instant, 100% guaranteed confirmation.

2.title: Financial security
2.description: Multiple fully secure payment options, with protection of your personal data.

3.title: Easy browsing
3.description: Advanced search tools to help you find the right property in moments.

4.title: Licensed Entity
4.description: Officially licensed by the Saudi Ministry of Tourism to ensure the highest level of trust.

5.title: Instant Support
5.description: Our customer service team is with you all week, ready to assist you anytime.

6.title: Visual Experience
6.description: Browse real photos and videos of each unit so you can book with confidence.

date-range-picker.can-edit: You can modify dates completely freely

footer.desciption: The platform for the best site for displaying apartments for rent in Saudi Arabia, self -entry apartments, chalets on the sea, villas, farms, and camps

auth.enter-your-phone-number: Enter your mobile phone number to create an account or log in.
auth.to-reseve-otp: Enter your mobile phone number to log in or create a new account, be sure to link the number you entered with the WhatsApp application to receive the verification code.

verify-otp.title: Please enter the code to continue
verify-otp.description: The verification code has been sent to: {value}

auth.title: Log in or sign up

price-filter.title: Select the right price for you

pools-filter.title: Determine the type of swimming pools

unit.ratings-message: The property was evaluated by {number} guests
unit.area-message: The area of ​​this unit was identified with approximately

reviews.description: This property was evaluated, based on evaluation, reviews and reliability data

unit.location-title: The site where you will be resided in
unit.location-description: The approximate site of the place will now appear, not the exact site, knowing that the site's accurate information will appear immediately after confirming the reservation on the reservation page
unit.mabet-garentee-description: We guarantee the validity of the information and the cleanliness of the place 💚

madfu-modal.title: Scan the QR code to complete payment.

payment-form.title: Payment methods
payment-form.description: Choose the appropriate payment method for you with the options that Mabet platform provides to you.
payment-form.use-wallet-description: Activate the remaining balance in wallet {value}
payment-form.madfu-description: Pay by parts without interest without fees

nafath.title: Verify you account with nafath
nafath.sub-title: Verify your account for a trusted and secure booking
nafath.description: To ensure your safety and the reliability of bookings, we need to verify your national identity through the 'Nafath' platform approved by the Saudi government.
nafath.id-label: Please enter the national identity number
nafath.button-text:
🔒 Don't worry! 
Your information is 100 % secure and is compatible with the Ministry of Tourism systems.
nafath.list-item-2: Trustees of your dealings inside the platform.

payment-redirect-page.title: 🎉 Your payment has been successfull!
payment-redirect-page.description: Thank you for choosing Mabet, your reservation, and all the details have been sent to your email.
payment-redirect-page.sub-description: You can follow the reservation details, or communicate with the host through the "reservations" section.
payment-redirect-page.fail-title: An error occurred while trying to complete the reservation
payment-redirect-page.fail-description:
The payment process appears to be not complete or a technical error event. 
Don't worry, no amount has been deducted.
payment-redirect-page.fail-sub-description: We advise you to re -try, or communicate with customer service if the problem persists.
payment-redirect-page.retry: Return to the real estate page

user-data-modal.title: Complete your personal data
user-data-modal.sub-title: Complete your data for an integrated reservation experience
user-data-modal.description: We need your email to send important reservation details and notifications, and let us share the latest offers and updates.
user-data-modal.agree-label:
I agree to the policy of conditions and conditions, and the reservation policy.

This is to ensure a safe and transparent reservation experience for all users.
